output_list.criticism: The distributeToken function has an integer overflow in the calculation of the 'to' value, allowing an attacker to set an arbitrary value for the 'to' parameter. This vulnerability can lead to loss of funds for the contract owner and potentially other users.

Integer overflow in the calculation of the 'to' value, allowing an attacker to set an arbitrary value for the 'to' parameter. This vulnerability can lead to loss of funds for the contract owner and potentially other users.
